result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

In 15CF375: Ct. 1 (Felony BJ)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 2 (Felony BJ)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 3 (Felony BJ)>>D&RI. 
In 15CF503: Ct. 2 (Felony BJ)>>D&RI. 
In 16CF98: Ct. 2 (Possession of Narcotic Drugs)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 15CF553: Ct. 4 (DC/Repeater/DA)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 15CF359: Ct. 1 (Felony BJ)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 15CF44: Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 15CF503: Ct. 1 (Felony BJ)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 16CF98: Ct. 1 (Deliver Amphetamine)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 

COURT ORDERS: 
In 15CF553: Ct. 4>>SWH for 2 years probation - CONDITION: 1 DA surcharge. 
In 15CF359: Ct. 1>>SWH for 4 years probation. 
In 15CF44: Ct. 1>>SWH for 4 years probation. 
In 15CF503: Ct. 1>>SWH for 4 years probation. 
In 16CF98: Ct. 1>>SWH for 4 years probation - CONDITION: 258 days MCJ with huber for work/treatment/school if def qualifies. 

COURT ORDERS as CONDITION of probation in ALL: assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; AODA and follow through with recommendations; maintain absolute sobriety from drugs/alcohol except for prescriptions taken as prescribed and with prior agent authorization; maintain fulltime employment/school/combination of the 2 of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 9 hours CS per week; DNA sample and surcharge; $50 buy money to MCSD; CC. 
COURT finds the def entitled to NO days jail credit in 15CF503, 15CF44, 15CF359, 15CF553, and 107 days jail credit in 16CF98. 

Adj: 9:01 am
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 12, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Robin Kennedy

Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Police escort to retrieve any personal belonings.
